backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining menu items and orders with CRUD-like operations, including creating items, toggling availability, and placing orders.
backend/migration.mo: Migration utility converting old menu items to include a new 'available' field defaulting to true.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files and related components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining global color tokens and dark mode variables.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and wraps all pages in the AppLayout component.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Header with site branding, navigation links, and cart icon showing item count.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Page layout wrapping content with header, backend connection banner, and footer.
frontend/src/components/BackendConnectio: Alert banner that displays backend connection errors with retry support.
React context managing cart state with reducer and localStorage persistence.
frontend/src/features/cart/useCart.ts: Provides cart state via context, with actions to modify items and compute totals.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendConnectionS: Checks actor query state for connection errors and exposes a retry mechanism.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication context with login, logout, and stored identity handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for menu, orders, and admin actions using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind config with custom light/dark color variables and base styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Renders the shopping cart UI with quantity controls, line totals, and navigation to checkout.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Handles checkout form, validation, order placement, and displays errors or redirects on success.
frontend/src/pages/MenuManagementPage.ts: Admin page to create new menu items and toggle their availability using form inputs and mutation hooks.
frontend/src/pages/MenuPage.tsx: Customer-facing menu view that loads dishes, displays availability, and allows adding items to the cart.
frontend/src/pages/OrderConfirmationPage: Displays confirmation details for a specific order, including items, total price, and status.
frontend/src/pages/OrderLookupPage.tsx: Lets users enter an order ID and fetch its status with error handling for missing or unreachable orders.
frontend/src/utils/orderStatus.ts: Utility helpers for normalizing order status and mapping it to labels, messages, and UI variants.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, color tokens, fonts, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Defines project metadata, feature list, known issues, and architectural notes for the Moms Kitchen app, including menu availability and deployment issues.
